API Key from Hydrop Systems account: The API key for your hydrop account
If you do not yet have an API key, pleas: You can generate an API key by navigating to Settings ⮕ Account ⮕ API Key in the hydrop app.
If you like this project and would like: If you like this project and would like to support its development, you are welcome to leave a donation.
Name of the water meter as defined in yo: The name assigned to the hydropmeter in the hydrop app
Number of days to fetch historical data: Number of days for which historical data is stored
